page.title: 18FARM VISIT
page.content: On 22nd May 1985 we went to Mr Cookes farm on Deeping High Bank. Mr Cooke has 7 SHIRE HORSES. The first thing we did was to look at his prize-winning horse CHARM and her foal who is about 8 weeks old. CHARM is about 10 years old and has won the Lincolnshire show, the Royal Show and Wembly three years running. CHARM has a sister who has a foal 12 weeks old.Horses are sold to America and Canada and people come across the world to see them. When horses are entered for shows his daughter plaits their mains and tails. As well as horses, the farm has cattle and sheep and a donkey. He has 300 acres of land and 7 tractors and 6 ploughs to work this.
